hero.title: How We Work
hero.subtitle: Our proven 5-step high-pressure cleaning process ensures exceptional results every time, with attention to detail and safety.

steps.title: Initial Assessment
steps.description: We evaluate your property to determine the best cleaning approach and identify any special requirements.
details: Property inspection and surface analysis
Identify stains, mold, and problem areas
Determine appropriate pressure settings
Plan the most efficient cleaning route

steps.title: Preparation & Setup
steps.description: We protect your property and set up our professional-grade equipment for optimal results.
details: Cover and protect plants and outdoor furniture
Set up professional pressure washing equipment
Connect to water source and test pressure
Apply pre-treatment solutions where needed

steps.title: High-Pressure Cleaning
steps.description: Using industrial-grade equipment, we systematically clean every surface to perfection.
details: Use appropriate pressure for each surface type
Apply specialized cleaning solutions
Remove dirt, grime, mold, and stains
Work in systematic patterns for even coverage

steps.title: Final Rinse & Inspection
steps.description: We thoroughly rinse all surfaces and conduct a final quality inspection to ensure perfection.
details: Complete final rinse of all cleaned surfaces
Remove any remaining cleaning solution residue
Inspect work for quality and completeness
Clean up equipment and work area

steps.title: Quality Assurance
steps.description: We walk through the completed work with you to ensure 100% satisfaction with the results.
details: Complete walkthrough with customer
Address any concerns or touch-ups
Provide maintenance recommendations
Ensure complete customer satisfaction

features.title: Industrial-Grade Pressure Washers
features.description: Professional equipment delivering up to 4000 PSI

features.title: Eco-Friendly Solutions
features.description: Biodegradable cleaners safe for plants and pets

features.title: Variable Pressure Control
features.description: Adjustable settings for different surface types

safety.title: Safety & Quality Assurance
measures: All technicians are fully trained and certified
Proper safety equipment used at all times
